Rilakkuma cake for Caris’s first birthday. Figures are made with modeling chocolate. Everything except for the cake bunting is edible.

 

For Alton’s 3rd birthday. A 1/4 sheet cake. Car made with chocolate transfer. Balloons are Wilton’s candy melts.

 

Princess Peppa Pig cake for Bailey’s 5th birthday.  Peppa Pig, banner, stars, and hearts are made with modeling chocolate.

Super hero-themed smash cake.

Elsa and Anna cake just for fun! First time trying out edible images.

Trying out rose swirl cake. The butterflies are edible but they got a little soggy from sitting on the whipped cream frosting.

For my dear mom. 3-layer chocolate cake with whipped cream frosting.

 

For dear husband’s 40th birthday.

Fire truck themed birthday cake.

Buche de Noel made in 2013 Christmas.
